item.description:
CraniaoSacral Therapy with Mimi Rhys

 

Mimi Rhys of Phoenix Healing Arts will be speaking about craniosacral therapy and how it is used to treat both physical and emotional trauma and chronic pain.  This is a gentle, non-invasive and powerful manual and energetic therapy that focuses on releasing restrictions, including "energy cysts" that the body creates to protect itself from the impact of traumatic events.  Later, these cysts need to be released because they impair the normal function of muscles, organs and the immune system.  This is also a great adjunct to traditional talking therapy as well as a stand alone therapy.

 

Mimi Rhys is a Licensed Massage Therapist with a home-based practice in Brighton.  She is trained in a variety of manual and energetic therapies including CranioSacral Therapy and Lymph Drainage Therapy.

 

She specializes in these gentle techniques to treat physical and emotional trauma as well as chronic, painful conditions including TMJ, back pain, various injuriees from car accidents and fibromyalgia.  For more information, please see her website www.phoenixhealingarts.net.

 

This group is a wonderful, supportive community of professionals who work in all aspects of mind-body therapy. 

 

$10 meetup fee

 

We meet for potluck lunch at 11:30 am and get to know one another better, network and share resources.  Presenter speaks at 12:30 pm.

 

RSVP with what you'll bring to the potluck.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll greet you at the door
item.name: November Boston Area Mind-Body Therapies Meetup
